Class PsyRegExp

java.lang.Object
coneforest.psylla.core.PsyRegExp
All Implemented Interfaces:
PsyObject, PsyValue
@Type("regexp") public final class PsyRegExp extends Object implements PsyValue
The representation of regexp.
